message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its worth, I'm offering it at $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider adjusting your price to meet my budget?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is already a competitive price for a product of this caliber. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I understand your position, but I'm still unable to exceed $10,000 for this product. Could you possibly lower your price further?
